ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: For access to specimens at the Natural History Museum, Tring, we thank Robert Prys-Jones, Hein Van Grouw, and Mark Adams. For help collecting and analysing biometric data, we are grateful to many people, including Nico Alioravainen, Sam Jones, Monte Neate-Clegg, Hannah MacGregor, Uri Roll and Claire Vincent. We also thank Gil Bohrer and one anonymous reviewer for constructive comments.
